caption: Managed Entity
description: The Managed Entity object describes the type and version of an entity, such as a user, device, or policy. For types in the type_id enum list, an associated attribute should be populated. If the type of entity is not in the type_id list, information can be put into the data attribute, type_id should be 'Other' and the type attribute should label the entity type.
name: managed_entity

data.description: The managed entity content as a JSON object.

name.description: The name of the managed entity. It should match the name of the specific entity object's name if populated, or the name of the managed entity if the type_id is 'Other'.

org.description: The Organization object containing details about the managed organizational entity. This object includes properties such as the organization name, unique identifier, type, and other organizational metadata. This attribute should be populated when type_id is 4 (Organization).

policy.description: Describes details of a managed policy.

type.description: The managed entity type. For example: Policy, User, Organization, Device.

type_id.description: The type of the Managed Entity. It is recommended to also populate the type attribute with the associated label, or the source specific name if Other.

1.caption: Device
1.description: A managed Device entity. This item corresponds to population of the device attribute.

2.caption: User
2.description: A managed User entity. This item corresponds to population of the user attribute.

3.caption: Group
3.description: A managed Group entity. This item corresponds to population of the group attribute.

4.caption: Organization
4.description: A managed Organization entity. This item corresponds to population of the org attribute.

5.caption: Policy
5.description: A managed Policy entity. This item corresponds to population of the policy attribute.

6.caption: Email
6.description: A managed Email entity. This item corresponds to population of the email attribute.

7.caption: Network Zone
7.description: A managed Network Zone entity. Populate the name attribute with the zone name and/or the uid attribute with the zone ID. Additional zone information can be added to the data attribute.

uid.description: The identifier of the managed entity. It should match the uid of the specific entity's object UID if populated, or the source specific ID if the type_id is 'Other'.

version.description: The version of the managed entity. For example: 1.2.3.
